name: Ultimate Beachmaster
description:
"Of all the games I've played about F****** seals, this one holds the most promise"
- IGN.

Based on the episode of "Futurama" that cast the Planet Express crew as elephant seals, you are a "Sneaky Male" and must risk it all to mate with as many females as you can in order to become the ultimate beachmaster!

Controls in game, keyboard and Mouse compatible, windows version only. The goal is to bring different seacreatures to the females and score BEACHMASTER POINTS to win at being a sneaky male. Short game made for fun, enjoy!
